name: Music_732.wav
keywords: ['soul', 'passionate male vocal', 'shimmering crash cymbal', 'sustained strings melody', 'mellow arpeggiated piano melody', 'romantic', 'heartfelt', 'sizzling bells']
caption: The Soul song features a passionate male vocal singing over a shimmering crash cymbal, sustained strings melody and mellow arpeggiated piano melody. At the very beginning there are some sizzling bells. It sounds romantic and heartfelt - like something you would want to sing to your partner.
